Example 1 baseURL = "https://www.example.org/" The baseURL protocol+host is https://www.example.org The baseURL path is / {{< relurl "quez.html" >}} --> /quez.html {{< relurl "/quez.html" >}} --> /quez.html {{< relurl "../quez.html" >}} --> /quez.html {{< relurl "./quez.html" >}} --> /quez.html Example 2
